metadata.title: CVE-2022-48701 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in__snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()There may be a bad USB audio device with a USB ID of (0x04fa, 0x4201) andthe number of it's interfaces less than 4, an out-of-bounds read bug occurswhen parsing the interface descriptor for this device.Fix this by checking the number of interfaces.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
